bike.description: Surly Troll, Surly 4130 CroMoly steel. TIG-welded. Main triangle double-butted

components.description: Surly Troll, TIG-welded tapered & butted 4130 CroMoly, 100mm suspension corrected, tapered straight blade. Low- and mid-blade fully threaded through-blade rack eyelets; fender mount eyelets at dropout; 1-1/8˝ x 260mm threadless steer tube, 51mm disc mount (203mm max. rotor diameter), removable cantilever pivots, two sets of bottle mounts on each fork blade. Note: you can’t always mount bottles on the fork with every rack
Avid BB7, Cable actuated. 180/160mm rotors front & rear
WTB SST Comp, Steel rails. Black vinyl. Feels pretty o.k.
Shimano Deore Disc M525, 32h. QR. Black
